name: CL_COST_CNTR
description: The CL_COST_CNTR table contains billing cost center information.

columns.name: COST_CNTR_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the cost center or rate center record.

columns.name: COST_CNTR_ID_COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.

columns.name: COST_CENTER_NAME
columns.description: The name of the cost center.
